channel.title: Comments on: The Division of Old Testament Law

item.title: By: cbtseminary
item.dc:creator: cbtseminary
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/the-division-of-old-testament-law/#comment-469">Erik Gonçalves</a>.
Yes, we should keep the Sabbath. The Christian Sabbath is the first day of the week. See our previous blog series here: /the-first-day-of-the-week-in-the-new-testament-part-1-of-8/
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Erik Gonçalves.

Yes, we should keep the Sabbath. The Christian Sabbath is the first day of the week. See our previous blog series here: /the-first-day-of-the-week-in-the-new-testament-part-1-of-8/

item.title: By: Erik Gonçalves
item.dc:creator: Erik Gonçalves
item.description: Mas, pensando assim, então, e o Sábado? Devemos guardá-lo? Pois na atualidade guardamos o Domingo!! But then, what about the Sabbath? Should we keep it? Because today we keep Sunday !!
item.content:encoded:
Mas, pensando assim, então, e o Sábado? Devemos guardá-lo? Pois na atualidade guardamos o Domingo!!
But then, what about the Sabbath? Should we keep it? Because today we keep Sunday !!
